location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区复兴门内大街30号
location.en: No. 30, Fuxingmennei Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 直属中华人民共和国国务院领导的国有政策性银行，旨在支持中国的对外贸易和“走出去”战略。
description.en: A state-owned policy bank directly under the leadership of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, aimed at supporting China's foreign trade and 'Go Global' strategy.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行现任董事长。
description.en: Current Chairman of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行现任行长。
description.en: Current President of The Export-Import Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行首任董事长，曾任华润集团总经理及中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部副部长。他是提议创建中国进出口银行的关键人物。
description.en: The first chairman of The Export-Import Bank of China, he previously served as the general manager of China Resources Group and Vice Minister of the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation. He was a key figure in proposing the establishment of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于香港的中国国有企业集团。
description.en: A Chinese state-owned conglomerate headquartered in Hong Kong.

en: Hong Kong Export Credit Insurance Corporation

description.zh-cn: 根据香港法例成立的法定机构，为香港出口商提供出口信用保险服务。
description.en: A statutory body established under Hong Kong law to provide export credit insurance services to Hong Kong exporters.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部
en: Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，主管对外贸易和经济合作，后与对外经济贸易合作部合并组建为商务部。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for foreign trade and economic cooperation, later merged to form the Ministry of Commerce.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管国家财政收支、财税政策等事务。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and taxation policies, etc.

description.zh-cn: 中国四大国有商业银行之一。
description.en: One of the four major state-owned commercial banks in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党提出的一种经济体制模式，旨在将市场经济与社会主义基本制度相结合。
description.en: An economic system model proposed by the Communist Party of China, aiming to integrate the market economy with the basic socialist system.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府为鼓励本国企业，尤其是国有企业积极对外投资而制定的国家战略。
description.en: A national strategy formulated by the Chinese government to encourage domestic enterprises, especially state-owned enterprises, to actively invest abroad.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国对外国的援助

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国对外国的援助
en: Foreign aid of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国向其他国家提供的经济和技术援助。
description.en: Economic and technical assistance provided by the People's Republic of China to other countries.

description.zh-cn: 中国六大国有商业银行之一。
description.en: One of the six major state-owned commercial banks in China.

nodes.id: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司

zh-cn: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局下属的投资平台，中国进出口银行的主要股东之一。
description.en: An investment platform under the State Administration of Foreign Exchange and a major shareholder of The Export-Import Bank of China.

nodes.id: 上海盛盈房地产有限公司

zh-cn: 上海盛盈房地产有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行是直属中华人民共和国国务院领导的国有政策性银行。
description.en: The Export-Import Bank of China is a state-owned policy bank under the direct leadership of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈怀宇担任中国进出口银行的董事长。
description.en: Chen Huaiyu serves as the Chairman of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 王春英担任中国进出口银行的行长。
description.en: Wang Chunying serves as the President of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 佟志广是中国进出口银行的首任董事长。
description.en: Tong Zhiguang was the first Chairman of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，时任香港华润集团总经理的佟志广产生了设立中国出口信用机构的想法。
description.en: In 1986, Tong Zhiguang, then the general manager of the Hong Kong China Resources Group, conceived the idea of establishing a Chinese export credit agency.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 1991年，佟志广到中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部就职。
description.en: In 1991, Tong Zhiguang began working at the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

description.zh-cn: 佟志广受香港出口信用保险局启发，认为有必要开设一家中华人民共和国的出口信用机构。
description.en: Inspired by the Hong Kong Export Credit Insurance Corporation, Tong Zhiguang believed it was necessary to establish an export credit agency for the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 佟志广自1986年受启发后，持续推动中国出口信用机构的建立，并于1991年到对外贸易经济合作部就职后认为此事迫在眉睫，最终促成了中国进出口银行的建立。
description.en: After being inspired in 1986, Tong Zhiguang continuously promoted the establishment of a Chinese export credit agency, believing the matter was urgent after taking office at the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation in 1991, which ultimately led to the establishment of The Export-Import Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 根据《国务院关于组建中国进出口银行的通知》（国发《1994》20号），中国进出口银行正式组建。
description.en: According to the 'Notice of the State Council on the Establishment of The Export-Import Bank of China' (Guo Fa [1994] No. 20), The Export-Import Bank of China was formally established.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部是中国进出口银行的组建单位之一。
description.en: The Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China was one of the founding units of The Export-Import Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部是中国进出口银行的组建单位之一。
description.en: The Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation was one of the founding units of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国银行是中国进出口银行的组建单位之一。
description.en: Bank of China was one of the founding units of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行的创立是为了适应建立社会主义市场经济体制的需要。
description.en: The establishment of The Export-Import Bank of China was to meet the needs of building a socialist market economy system.

description.zh-cn: 中国进出口银行为配合国家“走出去”战略，提供对外承包工程贷款、境外投资贷款等业务。
description.en: To coordinate with the national 'Go Global' strategy, The Export-Import Bank of China provides services such as loans for overseas contracting projects and overseas investment loans.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外国的援助

description.zh-cn: 自1995年中华人民共和国援外体制改革起，中国进出口银行开始承办援外优惠贷款及转贷业务。
description.en: Since the reform of China's foreign aid system in 1995, The Export-Import Bank of China began to undertake concessional loans and on-lending business for foreign aid.

description.zh-cn: 交通银行与中国进出口银行签署战略合作协议，加强在银团贷款、结算代理、贸易融资等领域的合作。
description.en: Bank of Communications and The Export-Import Bank of China signed a strategic cooperation agreement to strengthen cooperation in areas such as syndicated loans, settlement agency, and trade finance.

relationships.source: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司持有中国进出口银行89.26%的股份，是其主要股东。
description.en: Wutongshu Investment Platform Co., Ltd. holds 89.26% of the shares of The Export-Import Bank of China, making it a major shareholder.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部持有中国进出口银行10.74%的股份。
description.en: The Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China holds 10.74% of the shares of The Export-Import Bank of China.

relationships.source: 上海盛盈房地产有限公司

description.zh-cn: 上海盛盈房地产有限公司是中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: Shanghai Shengying Real Estate Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 银鼎控股有限公司是中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: Yinding Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 欧鼎控股有限公司是中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: Ouding Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 美鼎控股有限公司是中国进出口银行的子公司。
description.en: Meiding Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of The Export-Import Bank of China.
